name: Super Skramble!
description:
Super Skramble! is a clone of Konami's Scramble.

It is a single player game in which the player flies a craft over hostile terrain and through cave systems shooting enemy craft, bombing ground stations and avoiding missiles. The objective is to achieve a high score with the three lives that are available.
Only one bomb can be on screen at a time and the player's fuel, which runs out rapidly, is replenished by destroying fuel dumps. There are eight different kinds of terrain to negotiate as the game gets progressively harder.
The game has a high score feature and can be played either with the keyboard or the joystick. There is no save game feature.

shot.caption: The title screen and high score table.
The game has just started. Here in level 1 the craft is flying over fuel dumps which must be destroyed in order to continue flying
A fuel dump has been destroyed which adds 200 units to the gas tank
All those missiles aren't there for nothing, sooner or later they will begin to launch
Part of the cave system taken from the game's demonstration mode
These baddies are either meteors or star wraiths. Either way they are to be avoided
The game gets to be very very hard indeed. There's nowhere to run and nowhere to hide in this section
This is the end of the demonstration sequence and is probably the end of game boss.
